Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-50086 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.43-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-50086 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.43-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package mysql is earlier than 8.0.43-1, affected by CVE-2025-50086
